title: ADC and one shotting
body:
Spending all game to build tank then getting one shot by the enemy adc
why and how is this even a thing whats the point in building armour and mr when you are just going to end up getting one shot by the enemy adc

replies.body: Link us to the game so we can see. Personally I don't believe it.
yay, a tank shredding assasin that doesnt rely on shredding tanks to do dmg, woopie, no counterplay other than to kill it before it breeds

> Tfw 3+ autos means 1 shot ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

realiticly though, you shouldn't be able to three hit kill a tank who has been building nothing but defensive stats and hp the whole game.
If the adc is fed and the tank is behind much like this scenario probably was there is no issues.
i feel as  if even if i go 5/0 in lane and the adc goes 5/0 that adc has the upper hand, regrdless or the scenario. except for maybe rammus.
Well they are designed to kill tanks. Just not necessarily alone.

I understand that, but the fact that they can, with no outside help, is the thing. either thornmail needs a decent buff, of lifesteal needs a nerf so thornmail actually is useful, or even make thornmail hurt on AD abilities or somehting, owuld make it worth buying at that point on anyone other than rammus
dont forget, yasuo's Q applies on hit affects, but im pretty sure u cant thornmail it
